Weddington Way - San Francisco, Full Time, H1B Transfers

Weddington Way is a rapidly growing, venture-backed San Francisco start-up building a new collaborative shopping experience for wedding parties. We are passionate about creating a fun, collaborative and rewarding experience for friends coming together around one of lifeâ€™s most important events. We've seen 5x growth in revenue from 2011 to 2012 and are on track to see the same type of massive growth this year.

We are hiring a full-stack engineer. If you are a kick-ass engineer who thrives in a fast-paced environment where you have ownership over the software stack and the metrics that drive the business, then Weddington Way might be the place for you! This is an opportunity to be an early engineer at a fast-growing startup. There is a LOT of room to jump in and have an impact very quickly. And then there's the opportunity to grow as the company grows.

Our current technologies include Ruby on Rails, MySQL and Solr.

You can find out more about the role and apply here: http://www.weddingtonway.com/jobs/software_engineer
